title: Manage a Building-Wide System Failure
description: The central air conditioning system in an apartment building fails during a heatwave. The property manager must manage the crisis.

tasks.description: Immediately dispatch an emergency HVAC contractor to diagnose the problem.
tasks.expected_outcome: A technician is on-site to assess the failure.

tasks.description: Send a mass notification to all tenants, acknowledging the problem and providing an initial estimate for repair time.
tasks.expected_outcome: All tenants are informed of the situation.

tasks.description: Provide regular updates to tenants as more information becomes available and, if necessary, arrange for temporary solutions like providing portable AC units for vulnerable residents.
tasks.expected_outcome: The situation is managed effectively with clear communication and proactive problem-solving.
